1119900.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rappan Athuk Player’s Guide (Any)
1119900.description:
Rappan Athuk Player's Guide

Rappan Athuk Player's Guide...
"What is this book exactly? This book is not a book of hints, tips, and tricks for playing in Rappan Athuk. Things like, "Be sure to search for the secret door in room 4 on the level of the minotaurs' maze" - you won't find it here." the Introduction begins
This Guide introduces you to Zelkor's Ferry, the last bastion of civilization just a couple days walk from Rappan Athuk. A vast underground complex with a deadly reputation. Here you will find people willing to relate their tales of danger and death to anyone willing to listen.
Part warning, part advice to those who would dare dread the dark paths of Rappan Athuk. Are these the five decade old imaginings of the grandfather at the Bristleback Inn? What kind of pain and suffering did that broken shell of a woman endure?
Are those scratchings they call maps as sketchy as they seem?
Only one way to find out.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
